description:
Microsoft developed a great new operating system. It's just a little "different" than what you might be used to, but don't worry, we can teach you how to get the most out of Windows 8.

In this course we will show you how to familiarize yourself with Windows 8, how to use the new Modern Apps and Navigation Features, how to work with Desktop Applications, how to Customize your new Windows 8 Environment, how to use Windows 8 Security Features, the "Hidden" Charms and much more!

In this course you will learn:

  • How to familiarize yourself with Windows 8.
  • How to use the new Modern Apps and Navigation Features.
  • How to work with Desktop Applications.
  • How to Customize your new Windows 8 Environment.
  • How to use Windows 8 Security Features.
  • How to use the "Hidden" Charms.
  • About the power of personal computers and their usefulness to essentially everyone.
  • How to organize your files.
  • How to customize your virtual workspace.
  • How to expand your productivity, and more!

SONIC's Windows 8.1 training videos will explain all the new functions and capabilities and provides practical tips in the form of easy-to-follow instructions.

Go from "Oh No" to "Pro" with our New Windows 8 training!
title: Using Windows 8
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
